ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe A RBSPICE TOF x Energy Oxygen Pitch Angle Distribution Data
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains Van Allen Probe A RBSPICE (Radiation Belt Storm Probes Ion Composition Experiment) Level 3 data of TOF x (Time of Flight) pulse height oxygen intensities and pressures that are sorted by pitch angles. Unidirectional differential oxygen fluxes are measured at high-energy and low-time resolution by 6 telescopes in 28 channels from 60 KeV-590 KeV and are binned by pitch angles in 17 bins. Data are available in physical units (counts/(s*cm^2*MeV)). Also available are percentage error of measurement, quality flag for the measurement for each pitch angle bin/timestep, calculated oxygen perpendicular and parallel partial pressure, number density calculated by integrating the distribution function and pictch angle for oxygen, pitch angle and energy integrated total intensity of oxygens observed during the spin, and omni directional total oxygen flux per spin. In addition, the data set contains orbit number, positions of the spacecraft in GEO, SM, and GSM coordinates, and dipole L values in different reference frames.
Level 3 data include the pitch angles of the six telescopes, based upon the measured magnetic field received from the EMFISIS (Electric and Magnetic Field Instrument Suite and Integrated Science) instrument. This processing is done in a series of algorithmic steps in which the EMFISIS magnetic field data is loaded, the ECT Magnetic Ephemeris data is loaded, the Level 2 intensity data file is copied, and the pitch angles are calculated and placed into the copied Level 2 file, creating a Level 3 file.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.
